title: Amoeba Bold (Fotostar) specimen?
content:
Curious if anyone has a full specimen of Amoeba Bold from Fotostar? Sample attached...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Amoeba.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322034909/http:/typophile.com/files/Amoeba.png) | 641.47 KB |
author: jch02140

comments.content: You might try finding and contacting Robert Trogman. He was the owner of FotoStar and Facsimile Fonts. He used to be on Typophile but I haven't seen his name in a while.
